Num.FuncTxt: local angle = {60,180,-60,-180} local ran = IMCRandom(1,4) return angle[ran]

Str.FuncTxt: local rand = IMCRandom(1, 6); if rand >= 1 and rand <= 3 then return "Npanto_hand"; elseif rand >= 4 and rand <= 5 then return "Npanto_sword"; else return "Npanto_archer"; end
local rand = IMCRandom(1, 6); if rand >= 1 and rand <= 3 then return "Npanto_hand"; elseif rand >= 4 and rand <= 5 then return "Npanto_sword"; else return "Npanto_archer"; end
local rand = IMCRandom(1, 6); if rand >= 1 and rand <= 3 then return "Npanto_hand"; elseif rand >= 4 and rand <= 5 then return "Npanto_sword"; else return "Npanto_archer"; end

Str.Str: 스펙터 군주가 소환한 소환물을 제거 하세요.

Str.FuncTxt: local num = IMCRandom(0, 3); if num == 0 then return 'raider' elseif num == 1 then return 'Onion_Red' elseif num == 2 then return 'pappus_kepa' elseif num == 3 then return 'ellom' end

local buf = GetBuffByName(self, "BrambleRage"); local over = GetOver(buf); return over + 1 .. " 차 소환이 시작되었습니다.";

Num.FuncTxt: local overBuff = "SHADOW_RAID_BOSS_FRENZY_BUFF" local ratio = 0; if IsBuffApplied(self, overBuff) == "YES" then local over = GetBuffOver(self, overBuff); if over ~= nil and over > 3 then if over >= 10 then over = 10 end ratio = ratio + (over * 0.08); end end return ratio;
